name: .XSQ File Extension
summary: Learn about .XSQ files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an XSQ file with xLights (multiplatform). Typically, XSQ files you download online are packaged with other, associated files in .ZIP archives. To import an XSQ file into xLights correctly, refer to the program's official import documentation.
If you want to view the XML data an XSQ file contains, you can open it in Microsoft Visual Studio Code (multiplatform) or any other text editor.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
